DOC.brief_summary: The study test hypothesis supplement diet subject Metabolic Syndrome 2000 IU vitamin D 1.8 g omega-3 fatty acid ( EPA + DHA ) per day , facilitate weight loss , improve body composition reduce metabolic biochemical risk factor associate type II diabetes cardiovascular disease . Adult men woman meet International Diabetes Federation criterion Metabolic Syndrome enrol embark 16 week diet exercise intervention use low glycemic index diet without supplementary vitamin D omega-3 . Subjects counsel weekly blood collect week 0 16 .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Omega-3 Inhibit Metabolic Syndrome
